DOC.brief_title: A Phase IV Study Onset Maintenance Antiplatelet Effect Ticagrelor Compared With Clopidogrel Chinese Patients With ACS
DOC.criteria: 1 . Provision inform consent prior study specific procedures 2 . Female male age least 18 year 3 . Females childbearing potential must negative urine pregnancy test enrolment willing use reliable contraception 4 . Index event nonST ST segment elevation ACS . 1.Contraindication reason clopidogrel ticagrelor administer ( eg , hypersensitivity , active bleeding , moderate severe liver disease , history previous intracranial bleed , GI bleed within past 6 month , major surgery within 30 day ) 2 . Oral anticoagulation therapy GP IIb/IIIa receptor antagonist therapy within 30 day prior randomisation stop 3 . Ticagrelor clopidogrel P2Y12 inhibitor within 14 day prior randomisation 4 . Requires dialysis 5 . Nonselective nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) prostacyclins ( PGI2 ) therapy stop
DOC.keyword: Non-ST ST Elevation Acute Coronary Syndromes , Ticagrelor , Clopidogrel , Antiplatelet Effect
